sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import subscriptions from '../subscriptions' const SubscriptionPlan = ({ match }) => { const subscription=subscriptions.find((s) =>s._id == match.params.id) return (
Go Back {subscription.name}

{subscription.name}

{subscription.duration}

 Price: Rs. {subscription.price} Description: {subscription.description} Price: Rs.{subscription.price}
) } export default SubscriptionPlan
